name: compute_metrics
title: Compute Trajectory Metrics
description: Computes derived metrics for segments (consecutive points) within trajectories, including distances, durations, directions, speeds, and accelerations.

inputs.name: input_tpoints_column
inputs.title: Trajectory points column
inputs.description: Column containing the points for each trajectory

inputs.name: input_distance_bool
inputs.title: Compute distances
inputs.description: If enabled, it will compute the distances between consecutive points in each trajectory
inputs.helper: If enabled, it will compute the distance between consecutive points in each trajectory, in a new column

inputs.name: input_distance_column
inputs.title: Distance column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the distance column

inputs.name: input_distance_unit_distance
inputs.title: Distance unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the distance

inputs.name: input_duration_bool
inputs.title: Compute durations
inputs.description: If enabled, it will compute the duration of each trajectory segment
inputs.helper: If enabled, it will compute the duration of each trajectory segment, in a new column

inputs.name: input_duration_column
inputs.title: Duration column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the duration column

inputs.name: input_duration_unit_time
inputs.title: Duration unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the duration

inputs.name: input_direction_bool
inputs.title: Compute directions
inputs.description: If enabled, it will compute the direction of each trajectory segment
inputs.helper: If enabled, it will compute the direction of each trajectory segment, in a new column

inputs.name: input_direction_column
inputs.title: Direction column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the direction column

inputs.name: input_speed_bool
inputs.title: Compute speeds
inputs.description: If enabled, it will compute the speed for each trajectory segment
inputs.helper: If enabled, it will compute the speed for each trajectory segment, in a new column

inputs.name: input_speed_column
inputs.title: Speed column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the speed column

inputs.name: input_speed_unit_distance
inputs.title: Speed distance unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the speed (distance)

inputs.name: input_speed_unit_time
inputs.title: Speed time unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the speed (time)

inputs.name: input_acceleration_bool
inputs.title: Compute accelerations
inputs.description: If enabled, it will compute the acceleration for each trajectory segment
inputs.helper: If enabled, it will compute the acceleration for each trajectory segment, in a new column

inputs.name: input_acceleration_column
inputs.title: Acceleration column name
inputs.description: Name to be assigned to the acceleration column

inputs.name: input_acceleration_unit_distance
inputs.title: Acceleration distance unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the acceleration (distance)

inputs.name: input_acceleration_unit_time
inputs.title: Acceleration time unit
inputs.description: Unit for the computation of the acceleration (time)

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The name of the table with the computed metrics
